title: Week 1 review
itunes:title: Week 1 review
description:
A room filled with heroes - Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, Chris Wesseling and Marc Sessler – recap all the games from the first Sunday of the regular season including the Rams upset victory over the Seahawks. Plus, each hero shares their big takeaway from the first week of the 2015 season.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
